original_title: Nationaal Werk voor kinderwelzijn-kolonie te Knokke
overview: Documentary about a child welfare's camp in Knokke. The children wear uniforms from 1830. Some images of the Congress Column in Brussels pass by. The children receive a toy gun and keep a parade at the war memorial in Knokke.
title: Nationaal Werk voor kinderwelzijn-kolonie te Knokke
